attributes.action: Strip Alex Ferguson of his Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: We urge the government to take all necessary measures to strip Alex Ferguson of his knighthood. His conduct as a peer of the realm is a disgrace to the sporting ideals of football. He ignores completely the 'RESPECT'' agenda of the Football Association and is a pathetic role model for all young people growing up to learn the game of football. He is a bad loser, a cheat and a bully.
